properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 2 at 3:27AM MST until February 2 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Snow accumulations of up to two to three inches.
Additionally, wet roads from the rainfall Saturday evening may
freeze, resulting in locally slick roads. Winds gusting as high
as 30 mph.

* WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST This Morning.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility under the strong showers.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
